title: ‘Volia’, Ukraine, and the future of Europe
summary_full: The EU is sustained by a shared commitment to be on the right side of history, upholding freedom, self-determination, peace and prosperity. Failure to stand with Ukraine in its darkest hour would betray this commitment
summary_public: The EU is sustained by a shared commitment to be on the right side of history, upholding freedom, self-determination, peace and prosperity. Failure to stand with Ukraine in its darkest hour would betray this commitment

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: Failure to stand with Ukraine... would betray this commitment
